Description: At top 40 guitarsour customers satisfaction is our first concern.All of out items have a 14 day return policy.If after 14 days you are not completely satisfiedwith your purchase, please return it for a full refund....Peace be with you... *all returned items must be in the same condition theywere at the time of sale. All original packing must be included. #5921Up for Sale is a 2004 Gibson Les Paul Studio! Gloss Black Finish! Made In USA! This is really cool. You are looking at a 2004 Gibson Les Paul Studio. Looking for all of the looks and tone of a REAL USA MADE LES PAUL but don't want the high price tag? The Les Paul Studio is the answer! All of the important Les Paul specs are here. Mahogany body with a maple top for big tone. One piece mahogany neck with a trapezoid inlayed rosewood fingerboard. 490R and 498T humbuckers dish out big tone. A Stopbar tailpiece and Tuneomatic bridge team up with Kluson style tuners for rock solid performance. The black lacquer finish is set off nicely by chrome plated hardware. A great looking guitar at an affordable price! The Les Paul Studio is one of the best deals around. Great tone and feel. This is a great opportunity to grab a killer instrument. The Studio model is one of Gibson's best deals. You get a real USA made Les Paul for about half the price of a Standard. Our luthier did a complete setup. Brand new strings were installed. Gig ready on Arrival! Nut Width: 1.65" Weight: 9.35 lbs. Complete Package with Gibson Hard Shell Case Included! Due to CITES Treaty for Endangered Wood (Mahogany, Rosewood) We no longer ship out of the USA. Cosmetics: Good Condition. This guitar has been played. There are some light strumming scratches on the Top. A couple of small chips on the edges of the guitar. The Back has some buckle rash from being held next to the player's body. Neck, Fingerboard and Headstock in great shape. Dripping with "Mojo". It is used. Not perfect. Overall, a really nice guitar. Look at the pictures closely. They will tell the story. Top 40 guitars is a Veteran owned business.
